titles.title: WEST Act of 2023
WEST Act of 2023
Woke Endowment Security Tax Act of 2023
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to apply a 6 percent excise tax on large endowments of certain private colleges and universities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Woke Endowment Security Tax Act of 2023 or the WEST Act of 2023
This bill imposes a 6% excise tax on certain private educational instutions with endowments of at least $12.2 billion and institutions with endowments of at least $9 billion that also operate a state contract college.
